title: Spanish prosecutors to ask for 8-year prison sentence for Shakira in tax fraud case
content:
1. Spanish prosecutors to ask for 8-year prison sentence for Shakira in tax fraud case  CBS News
  2. Shakira facing up to eight years in prison for alleged tax fraud  Sky News Australia
  3. Shakira Prosecutors Call for 8-Year Prison Sentence Over Alleged Tax Fraud in Spain  Yahoo Entertainment
  4. Prosecutor seeks eight years in prison for Shakira  Reuters
  5. Shakira tax fraud case: Prosecutors seek 8 years in prison, $24 million fine after singer rejects plea deal  Fox News
